issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Add in Check to Make Sure Registered Components are Running the Same Version of Eucalyptus

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While re-testing EUCA-3204 to make sure issue was resolved, I upgraded my cloud to use the latest euca2ools and eucalyptus software.  Software listing on NC for Eucalyptus is as follows:

{code}
[root@node1 ~]# rpm -qa | grep euca
eucalyptus-admin-tools-3.2.1-0.0.568.20130228git99339836.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-release-3.1-1.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-3.2.1-0.0.568.20130228git99339836.el6.x86_64
python-eucadmin-3.2.1-0.0.568.20130228git99339836.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-nc-3.2.1-0.0.568.20130228git99339836.el6.x86_64
euca2ools-release-2.1-2.el6.noarch
eucalyptus-gl-3.2.1-0.0.568.20130228git99339836.el6.x86_64
euca2ools-2.1.3-0.65.el6.noarch
{code}

Every attempt to launch an instance always fails with the following error:

{code}
2013-03-01 05:53:54 DEBUG 000007244 eucav2_sign_request      | eucav2_sign_request: base64 signature length=344 buf[n-1]=61 hash=14514
84534
2013-03-01 05:53:54 DEBUG 000007244 walrus_request_timeout   | {3638089472} walrus_request: writing GET output to /tmp/walrus-digest-R
pUulV
2013-03-01 05:53:54 DEBUG 000007244 walrus_request_timeout   | {3638089472} walrus_request: wrote 184 byte(s) in 1 write(s)
2013-03-01 05:53:54 ERROR 000007244 walrus_request_timeout   | {3638089472} walrus_request: server responded with HTTP code 403
2013-03-01 05:53:54  INFO 000007244 walrus_request_timeout   | {3638089472} walrus_request: due to error, removing /tmp/walrus-digest-
RpUulV
2013-03-01 05:53:54 ERROR 000007244 walrus_get_digest        | failed to download digest to /tmp/walrus-digest-RpUulV
2013-03-01 05:53:54 ERROR 000007244 art_alloc_vbr            | [i-4D6C4091] failed to obtain image digest from  Walrus
2013-03-01 05:53:54 ERROR 000007244 create_instance_backing  | [i-4D6C4091] failed to prepare backing for instance
2013-03-01 05:53:54 ERROR 000007244 startup_thread           | [i-4D6C4091] failed to prepare images for instance (error=1)
2013-03-01 05:53:54 DEBUG 000007244 change_state             | [i-4D6C4091] state change for instance: Staging -> Shutoff (Pending)
2013-03-01 05:53:54 DEBUG 000006763 doAssignAddress          | [i-4D6C4091] invoked (publicIp=192.168.55.101)
2013-03-01 05:53:56 DEBUG 000006763 doDescribeResource       | returning cores=5/6 mem=6771/7795 disk=937841/937851 iqn=iqn.1994-05.co
m.redhat:2986d6c971de
2013-03-01 05:53:56 DEBUG 000006763 doDescribeInstances      | invoked userId=eucalyptus correlationId=UNSET epoch=0 services[0]{.name
= .type= .uris[0]=}
2013-03-01 05:53:56 DEBUG 000006763 doDescribeInstances      | [i-4D6C4091] Pending pub=192.168.55.101 priv=10.106.5.13 mac=D0:0D:4D:6
C:40:91 vlan=42 net=13 plat=linux vols=
2013-03-01 05:53:56  WARN 000006775 libvirt_err_handler      | libvirt: Domain not found: no domain with matching name 'i-4D6C4091' (c
ode=42)
2013-03-01 05:53:56  INFO 000006775 monitoring_thread        | [i-4D6C4091] cleaning up state for instance
2013-03-01 05:53:56 DEBUG 000006775 diskutil_ch              | ch(own|mod) '/instances/work/4XVKCF4WDM4NAIXBORW99/i-4D6C4091/*' eucaly
ptus.* 660
2013-03-01 05:53:56  INFO 000006775 monitoring_thread        | [i-4D6C4091] stopping the network (vlan=42)
2013-03-01 05:53:56 DEBUG 000006775 change_state             | [i-4D6C4091] state change for instance: Shutoff -> Teardown (Teardown)
2013-03-01 05:54:02 DEBUG 000006763 doDescribeResource       | returning cores=6/6 mem=7795/7795 disk=937851/937851 iqn=iqn.1994-05.co
m.redhat:2986d6c971de
{code}

NCs can ping Walrus no problem.  Information below:

*NC pinging Walrus*

{code}
[root@node1 ~]# ping 192.168.39.101
PING 192.168.39.101 (192.168.39.101) 56(84) bytes of data.
64 bytes from 192.168.39.101: icmp_seq=1 ttl=63 time=0.205 ms
64 bytes from 192.168.39.101: icmp_seq=2 ttl=63 time=0.275 ms
^C
--- 192.168.39.101 ping statistics ---
2 packets transmitted, 2 received, 0% packet loss, time 1253ms
rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 0.205/0.240/0.275/0.035 ms
[root@node1 ~]# ping 192.168.39.102
PING 192.168.39.102 (192.168.39.102) 56(84) bytes of data.
64 bytes from 192.168.39.102: icmp_seq=1 ttl=63 time=0.134 ms
64 bytes from 192.168.39.102: icmp_seq=2 ttl=63 time=0.205 ms
^C
--- 192.168.39.102 ping statistics ---
2 packets transmitted, 2 received, 0% packet loss, time 1133ms
rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 0.134/0.169/0.205/0.037 ms
{code}

*IP information of NC*

{code}
[root@node2 ~]# ifconfig
em2       Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr D0:67:E5:EE:69:A2  
          inet addr:10.101.39.42  Bcast:10.101.39.255  Mask:255.255.255.0
          inet6 addr: fe80::d267:e5ff:feee:69a2/64 Scope:Link
          UP BROADCAST RUNNING PROMISC MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1
          RX packets:193144 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0
          TX packets:107173 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0
          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000 
          RX bytes:79545972 (75.8 MiB)  TX bytes:81655937 (77.8 MiB)
          Interrupt:17 Memory:c2000000-c2012800 

lo        Link encap:Local Loopback  
          inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0
          inet6 addr: ::1/128 Scope:Host
          UP LOOPBACK RUNNING  MTU:16436  Metric:1
          RX packets:19 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0
          TX packets:19 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0
          collisions:0 txqueuelen:0 
          RX bytes:1672 (1.6 KiB)  TX bytes:1672 (1.6 KiB)
{code}

*iptables rule on the CC*

{code}
[root@viking-03 ~]# iptables-save | grep MASQ
-A POSTROUTING -s 10.101.39.0/24 -o em1 -j MASQUERADE 
-A POSTROUTING -s 10.106.0.0/16 ! -d 10.106.0.0/16 -j MASQUERADE 
{code}

*sysctl config on CC*

{code}
[root@viking-03 ~]# sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.conf
net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1
net.ipv4.ip_nonlocal_bind = 1
net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter = 1
net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route = 0
kernel.sysrq = 0
kernel.core_uses_pid = 1
net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies = 1
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables = 0
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables = 0
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-arptables = 0
kernel.msgmnb = 65536
kernel.msgmax = 65536
kernel.shmmax = 68719476736
kernel.shmall = 4294967296
{code}

*Walrus Health Checks*

{code}
[root@viking-01 ~]# drbd-overview
  1:r0  Connected Primary/Secondary UpToDate/UpToDate C r----- /var/lib/eucalyptus/bukkits ext4 916G 150G 720G 18% 

[root@viking-01 ~]# euca-describe-services | grep walrus
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	iron-flag      	DISABLED  	18  	http://192.168.39.102:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:iron-flag/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	wu-tang-forever	ENABLED   	18  	http://192.168.39.101:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:wu-tang-forever/

[root@viking-01 ~]# euca-describe-images emi-C1613E67
IMAGE	emi-C1613E67	latest-ubuntu-precise/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml	345590850920	available	public		x86_64	machine				instance-store

[root@viking-01 ~]# ls -ailh /var/lib/eucalyptus/bukkits/latest-ubuntu-precise
total 1.6G
5505025 drwxr-xr-x  2 eucalyptus eucalyptus 4.0K Feb 28 18:47 .
      2 drwx------ 69 eucalyptus eucalyptus 4.0K Feb 27 18:40 ..
5505048 -rw-r--r--  1 eucalyptus eucalyptus  10M Dec  3 18:37 002c70f2-df35-4c0e-9edb-9bca953f130f

fields.summary: Instance failure to launch - "libvirt: Domain not found: no domain with matching name" Due to HTTP 403 Error from Walrus
fields.environment:
*HA*

2 x CLC, Walrus
2 x CC
1 x SC
3 x NC

comments.body:
Added the following files:

* output of instance failure from the ENABLED CLC perspective (i-4D6C4091)
* sosreport for the following:
** ENABLED CLC, Walrus
** ENABLED CC, SC
** All 3 NCs

sosreports contain all logs on each system, ip information, and additional system information.

Grabbed image information from DB running on ENABLED CLC and Walrus:

{code}
eucalyptus_cloud=# select metadata_display_name,metadata_image_unencrypted_checksum,metadata_image_size_bytes,metadata_image_is_public,metadata_image_unencrypted_checksum_type,metadata_image_manifest_path from metadata_images where metadata_display_name = 'emi-C1613E67';
 metadata_display_name |   metadata_image_unencrypted_checksum    | metadata_image_size_bytes | metadata_image_is_public | metadata_
image_unencrypted_checksum_type |                     metadata_image_manifest_path                     
-----------------------+------------------------------------------+---------------------------+--------------------------+----------
--------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------
 emi-C1613E67          | dd03d49969f62cc9370b86d1478151f3a773a7c7 |                1476395008 | t                        | SHA1     
                                | latest-ubuntu-precise/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml
{code}

*Disk Space on All NCs*

{code}
# grep INSTANCE_PATH /etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf
# in its work directory ($INSTANCE_PATH/eucalyptus/work).  By default
# its image cache directory ($INSTANCE_PATH/eucalyptus/cache).  By default
INSTANCE_PATH="/instances"

[root@node3 ~]# df -ah
Filesystem            Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
/dev/mapper/vg01-lv_root
                      493G  4.8G  463G   2% /
proc                     0     0     0   -  /proc
sysfs                    0     0     0   -  /sys
devpts                   0     0     0   -  /dev/pts
tmpfs                 3.9G     0  3.9G   0% /dev/shm
/dev/sda1             248M  108M  128M  46% /boot
/dev/mapper/vg01-lv_instances
                      985G   34G  902G   4% /instances
none                     0     0     0   -  /proc/sys/fs/binfmt_misc
sunrpc                   0     0     0   -  /var/lib/nfs/rpc_pipefs

[root@node2 ~]# df -ah
Filesystem            Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
/dev/mapper/vg01-lv_root
                      493G  5.0G  463G   2% /
proc                     0     0     0   -  /proc
sysfs                    0     0     0   -  /sys
devpts                   0     0     0   -  /dev/pts
tmpfs                 3.9G     0  3.9G   0% /dev/shm
/dev/sda1             248M  108M  128M  46% /boot
/dev/mapper/vg01-lv_instances
                      985G   28G  907G   3% /instances
none                     0     0     0   -  /proc/sys/fs/binfmt_misc
sunrpc                   0     0     0   -  /var/lib/nfs/rpc_pipefs

[root@node1 ~]# df -ah
Filesystem            Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
/dev/mapper/vg01-lv_root
                      493G  5.0G  463G   2% /
proc                     0     0     0   -  /proc
sysfs                    0     0     0   -  /sys
devpts                   0     0     0   -  /dev/pts
tmpfs                 3.9G     0  3.9G   0% /dev/shm
/dev/sda1             248M  108M  128M  46% /boot
/dev/mapper/vg01-lv_instances
                      985G  9.6G  925G   2% /instances
none                     0     0     0   -  /proc/sys/fs/binfmt_misc
sunrpc                   0     0     0   -  /var/lib/nfs/rpc_pipefs

EUCA-5288 is a feature request that is based upon this issue.
Issues marked fixed in currently released versions of the software. Moving to Closed fixed
